products.name: MacBook Pro
products.description: The MacBook Pro is a high-performance laptop equipped with Apple's M1 chip, offering lightning-fast processing and stunning visuals.

products.name: iPhone 13
products.description: The iPhone 13 features a sleek design, advanced camera system, and impressive battery life, making it a top choice for smartphone users.

products.name: iPhone 15
products.description: With its powerful A16 chip, the iPhone 15 offers enhanced performance and stunning photography capabilities in a compact design.

products.name: Samsung S23 Ultra
products.description: The Samsung S23 Ultra combines cutting-edge technology with an impressive camera system, perfect for photography enthusiasts.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab A9
products.description: The Galaxy Tab A9 is a versatile tablet that provides an immersive viewing experience, ideal for entertainment and productivity.

products.name: AirPods Pro
products.description: AirPods Pro offer active noise cancellation and high-quality sound, ensuring an exceptional audio experience.

products.name: Joyroom Power Bank 30000 mAh
products.description: The Joyroom Power Bank provides a massive 30000 mAh capacity, ensuring your devices stay charged on the go.

products.name: Anker 312 Charger 25 W
products.description: The Anker 312 Charger delivers 25W of power, enabling fast and efficient charging for your devices.
